title: Telegraph Travel Awards 2015/16: win a trio of Maldives holidays worth £36,000
text: The prize This prize offers a unique chance to enjoy three Maldives luxury holidays at three different resorts over three years. The three resorts are Anantara Kihavah Villas, The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi and the Conrad Maldives Rangali Island resort. How to enter Follow this link to tell us about your favourite travel companies and destinations - and to enter the draw for one of 27 prizes . You will need to leave your name, telephone number and a valid email address. See here for full terms and conditions . The resorts Anantara Kihavah Villas Enjoying a prime location in the Maldives’ Baa Atoll island archipelago and on the doorstep of Hanifaru Bay, Anantara Kihavah Villas is the perfect place from which to explore the underwater world of the Indian Ocean. The prize includes a seven-night stay on an all-inclusive basis, two spa treatments, two free activities, return flights and airport transfers. The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi This 52-acre island offers the ideal environment to let go of your worldly concerns with traditional Maldivian villas, mouth-watering cuisine across 11 restaurants, a diverse range of leisure activities that will see you speeding across the ocean’s surface and delving beneath its depths. The prize includes seven nights’ full-board in an Infinity Water Villa, two spa treatments, sea plane transfers, but not flights. The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi Conrad Maldives Rangali Island Be whisked away by seaplane to the Conrad Maldives Rangali Island hotel where exceptional hospitality awaits you on this private island. The resort provides travellers with unique experiences, from swimming with whale sharks to undersea dining or simply spend the day soaking up the sun with cocktails in hand, enjoying holistic treatments at the over-water spa or taking in the wonders of the Indian Ocean during a sunset cruise. The prize includes seven nights in a Beach Villa on a half-board basis, one 60-minute massage, two complimentary excursions, return seaplane transfers and return flights. Terms and conditions All prizes above subject to availability and are valid for one year from competition publication date. Peak seasons are excluded (Christmas, New Year and Easter) and further Blackout dates apply. Flights are valid for travel from London airports (Heathrow or Gatwick) to Male and will be determined by the resort. Anantara Kihavah Villas · 7 x nights on a fully comp basis · 2 x spa treatments · 2 comp activities · 2 return economy flights · Airport transfers The Sun Siyam Iru Fushi · 7 x nights on a fully comp basis · 2 x spa treatments · 2 comp activities · 2 return economy flights · Airport transfers Conrad Maldives Rangali Island · 7 nights’ accommodation in a Beach Villa · Daily breakfast in Atoll Market or Vilu Restaurant · Daily dinner in Atoll Market · One 60 minute massage per person at The Spa Retreat · 2 x complimentary excursions including snorkelling and luxury sunset dolphin cruise · Return seaplane transfers for two · 2 x return flights London-Male Telegraphtravel
